fields.request: Manual QA: Verify Markdown reader alternative formats
fields.request_details: Open the documentation reader and verify the new format handling. View the MPL license at /read/docs/legal/licenses/MPL-2.0.txt and confirm the plain text renders in a preformatted block without a table of contents. Visit /read/docs/examples/reader-sample-data.csv and ensure the CSV rows appear in a bordered table. Finally, load /read/command.sh and confirm scripts render in a monospace code viewer instead of a blank page.
